title: Unspecified Error Received while Patching
body:
On 8/23/2016, I tried launching League of Legends, like I usually do. I've never had an issue like this. After it gave me the "scanning files" message in place of the play button for about a half a second, a window appeared that said "unspecified error." After force repatching, I tried uninstalling the game. As soon as the patcher began downloading the game, it gave me the same error message. 

After closing and re-opening the window, (it might have been in administer mode at this point, I can't remember,) the game began downloading. After it had gotten past "step 1/2" (updating interface,) it gave me the same error message. I tried disabling my antivirus, and am currently downloading the game from the start again. I have yet to see if the patcher can get past "step 1/2."

At this point, I am considering just wiping my hard drive and re-installing windows, but this would be a massive pain. I have at least 300 gigabytes of games that I would have to re-download on top of League of Legends, not to mention the backup disk I have for my desktop is very old. If I could find a solution for this without wiping my hard drive, that would be fabulous.

Sorry if this isn't the right place to post this, I'm just kind of panicked and sleep deprived from trying to find a solution to this. Any help is greatly appreciated. If needed, I can send my log files to you.

System information:

Microsoft Windows 10 Home 10.0.14393 Build 14393 (anniversary update)
GTX 970
Intel Core i7-6700 CPU @ 3.40GHz, 4 cores
Avast Antivirus (temporarily disabled)

replies.body: I have the exact same issue , and i think if the patcher skips the 1/2 download part the game will not be complete since a huge amount of files are not downloaded correctly , if anyone has a fix please let us know

I'd like to help but I need one more piece of information to help out!  The patcher is doing different things at different times, so to better understand what's going on I need to know at what percent you are receiving this error.  A screenshot could help too.  Let me know!
The error occurred at 0%. As soon as I launched the patcher, the "scanning files" bar appeared, and I was prompted with an "unspecified error" message.

Thanks for the update!  At this stage, the patcher needs to scan files but is being blocked.  Go over our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide for a list of steps to get this fixed up.  Once you get it going, let it continue to process.  As long as you don't get an error, you'll be set.  Hope that helps!
The league patcher is making progress on the second step of the download. Thank you so much for your help. I've been nervous all day, and I just wanted you to know how much you helped me.

Thank you so much. I've been a nervous wreck waiting for the patcher to re-download the game. If I run into the same issue as I did before,  where I receive the error message after "step 1/2: Updating Interface", I'll be sure to say something.
